titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair from February 2, 1996, through February 26, 1996.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-457, by Mrs. Waldholtz.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 181.

action.text: Mr. Solomon asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 352 be laid on the table. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/31/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair on the following dates: (1) February 2 through 6, 1996; (2) February 6 through 9, 1996; (3) February 9 through 13, 1996; (4) February 13 through 16, 1996; (5) February 16 through 20, 1996; (6) February 20 through 23, 1996; and (7) February 23 through 26, 1996.
